text: err emergency services to monday's
horrific attack the police have
confirmed that eight suspects remain in
custody and that progress is being made
in the case
but the threat level as assessed by the
Independent Joint Terrorism analysis
center would remain at critical and the
public should remain vigilant
I was also briefed on operation tempura
around 1,000 members of the Armed Forces
are assisting the police providing
important reassurance ahead of a bank
holiday weekend of busy events shortly I
will be traveling to the NATO summit
where I will be working with
international colleagues on defeating
terrorism I will make clear to President
Trump that intelligence that is shared
between our law enforcement agencies
must remain secure tomorrow I will be
attending the g7 summit in Italy where I
will lead a discussion on
counterterrorism and on how we will work
together to prevent the plotting of
terrorist attacks online and to stop the
spread of hateful extremist ideology on
social media I'm very grateful for the
expressions of support and condolences
that the UK has received from
international colleagues in recent days
g7 and NATO will enable us to work more
closely together as we work to defeat
the evil of terrorism
